name: Bounty hunter Deetch
description:
PS: the browser version contain bugs (boss battle missing collision, effects, enemies dont react to bullets...etc) , for better experience play the WINDOWS version(polished version).

You play as Deetch the bounty hunter , who wants to bring all bandits to justice

controls:

Deetch:

-arrows to move.

- c to attack.

- up arrow to use finisher(when icon appears).

- down arrow to dodge roll.

Horse control:

- left arrow to sprint.

- up arrow to jump.

- down arrow to dodge.

- c to shoot.

Music by:

WESTERN-WILD-WEST-COLLECTION-Dangerous-Meeting (preview version).
